publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2532 Dr Elaine Murray:Gretna Football Club - Promotion to the Second Division—That the Parliament congratulates Gretna FC on its promotion to the Scottish Second Division and on being the first British club to be promoted this season.

S2M-2532 Gretna Football Club - Promotion to the Second Division (lodged on 7 March 2005) David Mundell*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Bill Butler*, Tommy Sheridan*, Christine May*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Bristow Muldoon*, Mr David Davidson*, Mike Pringle*, Des McNulty*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*

S2M-2532 Gretna Football Club - Promotion to the Second Division (lodged on 7 March 2005) Maureen Macmillan*, Jackie Baillie*, Chris Ballance*, Robin Harper*, Nora Radcliffe*, Scott Barrie*, Alex Fergusson*, Colin Fox*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2532 Gretna Football Club - Promotion to the Second Division (lodged on 7 March 2005) Karen Gillon*, Mike Watson*

S2M-2532 Dr Elaine Murray:Gretna Football Club - Promotion to the Second Division—That the Parliament congratulates Gretna FC on its promotion to the Scottish Second Division and on being the first British club to be promoted this season. Supported by: David Mundell, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Bill Butler, Tommy Sheridan, Christine May, Mr Frank McAveety, Mr Jamie Stone, Bristow Muldoon, Mr David Davidson, Mike Pringle, Des McNulty, Mr Brian Monteith, Mary Scanlon, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Maureen Macmillan, Jackie Baillie, Chris Ballance, Robin Harper, Nora Radcliffe, Scott Barrie, Alex Fergusson, Colin Fox, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Karen Gillon, Mike Watson
